headline: A Fresh Look at Booking Holdings (BKNG) Valuation Following Momentum Shift
summary: Booking Holdings (BKNG) shares have been trading lower over the past month, with returns lagging broader market performance. Investors may be weighing the company’s longer-term growth prospects in comparison to recent pressure on the stock price. See our latest analysis for Booking Holdings. Even with recent share price pressure, Booking Holdings has delivered a remarkable 149% total shareholder return over the past three years and 131% in five, though momentum has clearly faded in the past...
